CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi only seem moderately comfortable with this activity. Mot , especially , is unsure of the purpose of the activity. Most of the time is spent arranging the silver men or playing with the yellow wand. Chi pretends that one of the silver men plays basketball. Discussion about the magnets centers primarily on their strength. EXP remains in the background. Mot does most of the talking.

u.a: MOT and Chi sit on one side of a coffee table with the magnets spread out on the coffee table in front of them; Mot is sliding silver men around on the black base , and Chi picks up various objects and lays them on the black base; a man and two other children sit on a couch in the background
picks up the black base and then sets it back down
turns the black base over so that the flat silver circle is on top
places a nut on the black base
places a silver man on the black base .
refers to the black base

g.ga: box which contained the silver men

u.a: places a silver man on the black base; it stands
places the orange ball on top of the standing silver man
places a nut , the basketball hoop , on the black base
takes out a another silver man from the plastic box and sets it up on the black base
stands up a silver man which was lying flat on the base
lays the silver man back down on the black base
lays a stick down across the surface of the black base
moves the men on the black base slightly
removes the orange ball from one of the silver men and then moves it between the two standing silver men briefly; then , she sets the orange ball on the base in the space between the silver men
picks up a nut from the black base , sets it back down , and removes hand
sets the orange ball in front of a silver man and knocks the silver man over
picks up two silver men from the black base and stands one up on the base
stacks up two silver men on the base
removes a silver man from the base
hits the orange ball with a silver man
sets a silver man upside down on the base .

hits the orange ball with a silver stick; then picks up the upside-down silver man and turns it to stand on its feet , but it only stands briefly; Mot goes back to hitting the orange ball with the silver stick
places a silver man on the base next to the orange ball
reaches for the box to see what else is inside the box , but doesn't take anything out of the box
picks up the yellow wand; a silver man attaches to it from the black base
takes the yellow wand from Mot
rotates a silver man on the base
removes the turtle , the flat red lego pieces , and the orange man from the box
man on the couch
stands a silver man on the flat red lego piece
holds box in hands and looks at it .

g.ga: probably a picture on the box

u.a: picks up turtle , sets it on black base and then puts it back on the coffee table

g.ga: to make the construction pictured on the box

u.a: clears off objects from the black base
places the yellow flat triangle on the black base
holds box , looks at picture
touches the purple star Chi has just placed on the base as if to remove it
removes the purple star from the black base magnet
stands a silver man on the black base , and places a second silver man upside-down on top of the first silver man
stands a third silver man on the shoulders of the second silver man
stands a silver stick on the head of the top silver man
tries to place a fourth silver man on top of the silver stick , but it won't stay
takes fourth silver man from Chi and places it on the side of the third silver man
tries to take the fourth silver man back
keeps fourth silver man , tries to make it stick to the third silver man , and tries to keep the silver stick standing on top
takes the third silver man and the silver stick from Mot

g.ga: on top of third silver man

u.a: points to a piece in the plastic box
hands Chi another silver stick from the plastic box
tries to stand the second silver stick on top of the fourth silver man's head
takes the second silver stick from Chi; attaches it horizontally to the side of the first silver man
picks up a nut and moves to place it on top of the horizontal silver stick; it falls

g.ga: flat red lego pieces stuck together

u.a: separates the two flat lego pieces
places a nut on the black base and then removes it

g.ga: on top of the silver man and stick structure

u.a: places the fifth silver man on top of the fourth
aft the tower falls
holds orange man in hand and looks briefly at the box
plays with a silver stick and a nut
holds and studies a flat square checkerboard magnet; places it on the base magnet
places the nut on the black base and lays the silver stick on top of it
arranges three nuts in a straight line with the silver stick on top of them , like a bench
places the purple star magnet on the black base
places the flat round magnet on top of the purple star; it doesn't stick , so she removes it
stands silver men up on the silver stick which lies across the nuts on the black base; the last silver man which she stands up is wobbling
sturdies the silver man on the silver stick
places another silver man on the silver stick
picked up the yellow wand; touches the yellow wand to the side of the black base and has a hard time getting the two magnets apart
picks up a thin magnet with the yellow wand
picks up silver men off the silver sticks with the yellow wand

g.ga: magnetic force as the wand nears magnetic objects or the black base

u.a: hands the wand to Chi
takes the wand back from Chi and demonstrates how Chi should move the wand in order to feel the force
touches the yellow wand to a nut on the black base several times
the wand sticks briefly to the nut and is hard to pull off; Chi can feel the force of the yellow wand magnet
EXP
